name: Group 29 - LunarBlade
description:
This is LunarBlade,  a space twin-stick shooter with 2  concept levels. Level 1 is more linear with waves of enemies, a shop wave eventually leading to a boss fight. The other level is an endless type mode with various waves of enemies.

The game has the functionality to record the top 10 scores of all time.

A team of 16 people developed this game who are listed below;

Animator 

Lead - Finley Bolton – Level 5

Character Art 

Lead - Dan Smedley – level 6 

Benjamin Pinches – Level 6 

Joshua Wills – Level 5

Design

Lead - Tom Whitehead – Level 6 

Rose Tyler – Level 5 

Robbie Marshall – Level 5

Environment Art

Connor Clarke – Level 5

Ilya Bachorz – Level 5 

Osman Hassan – Level 5 

Ethan Williams – Level 5 

Tech

Max Newell – Level 5
